biotools.summary: PASTAQ (Pipelines And Systems for Threshold Avoiding Quantification) provides a set of tools for high-performance pre-processing of LC-MS/MS data. Avoiding the use of arbitrary intensity thresholds in early stages of the pipeline can aid in the detection of important biological low intensity signals common in metabolomics and proteomics experiments.
